name: Roy Tang
text: Kung kami lang naman ni Daniel, I'm sure afford namin yung P5  :p  The concern is more for our poorer countrymen na madalas konti lang ang load, they are more likely to need emergency services since they may live in more dangerous areas. Anyway, it's better than nothing, although I still hope the administration can make the call itself free (or at least maybe the telcos can tell us where that money goes - if it's to support govt programs that makes it a bit more acceptable)
